price: Lẹ́yìn náà, dájúdájú Àwa nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa àwọn tó lẹ́tọ̀ọ́ jùlọ sí wíwọ inú Iná.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
